Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to defining "period of war" for the alternative veterans' exemption
Summary: Relates to defining "period of war" for the alternative veterans' exemption; includes more recent hostilities in the definition of "period of war".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to defining "period of war" for the alternative veterans' exemption
